comment: I mixed centennial and Azacca (1oz each) and hopped continuously from 60 min on.  Added the same at flame out 175F but it cooled rapidly so very little hop stand.  Fermented 3 weeks at 60-65F and kegged with tea from 1 oz each home Chinook, Azacca, Centennial.
This brew turned out really well.  If anything were to change, I would swap cascade hops in for the centennial.
